text.jpText:
――まさかこの私が、ここまで
心をかき乱されるなんて……。
text.enText: ―I never thought I would be so disturbed by ……

text.jpText:
ふっ、暇つぶしのつもりだったのに……
本当に……罪作りね……。
text.enText:
Huh, I was just trying to pass the time.…… 
You're really…… guilty of that. ……

text.jpText:
哀しき宿命、正義と正義の避けられぬ戦い……
子ども向けと侮っていたわ。世界を広げて
くれたビコーにはサンクスを言わないとね。
text.enText:
Sad fate, the inevitable battle between 
justice and righteousness…… I underestimated 
it was for children. I have to say thanks 
to Biko for expanding my world. I have 
to say thanks to Vicor for giving me the 
opportunity to do so.
